languages.text: {n}Друкари улыбается уголками губ.{/n} "Слова — бледная тень реальности. Но на твоем судне еще довольно мяса. Еще довольно... возможностей повторить".

{n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари улыбается уголками губ.{/n} "Слова — бледная тень реальности. Но на твоем судне еще довольно мяса. Еще довольно... возможностей повторить".

{n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋嘴角泛起一丝微笑。{/n}“言语不过是现实苍白的阴影，但你的船上还有很多肉，也有很多……再次享受盛宴的机会。”
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋嘴角泛起一丝微笑。{/n}“言语不过是现实苍白的阴影，但你的船上还有很多肉，也有很多……再次享受盛宴的机会。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは口角をニヤリと上げる。{/n}「言葉は現実の淡い影だ。だが、お前の船にはまだまだ肉がたっぷりある。それにさらに…お楽しみを繰り返す機会もな」
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは口角をニヤリと上げる。{/n}「言葉は現実の淡い影だ。だが、お前の船にはまだまだ肉がたっぷりある。それにさらに…お楽しみを繰り返す機会もな」

languages.text: {n}Las comisuras de sus labios forman una sonrisa.{/n} «Las palabras son un mero eco de la realidad. Pero sigue quedando mucha carne en tu nave. Habrá... ocasiones de sobra para una repetición».
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las comisuras de sus labios forman una sonrisa.{/n} «Las palabras son un mero eco de la realidad. Pero sigue quedando mucha carne en tu nave. Habrá... ocasiones de sobra para una repetición».

languages.text: {n}Les commissures de ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Les mots ne sont qu'un pâle reflet de la réalité, mais les cales de votre vaisseau sont encore remplies de chair fraîche. Autant d'occasions de remettre le couvert encore et encore. »
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les commissures de ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Les mots ne sont qu'un pâle reflet de la réalité, mais les cales de votre vaisseau sont encore remplies de chair fraîche. Autant d'occasions de remettre le couvert encore et encore. »

languages.text: {n}Seine Mundwinkel verziehen sich zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Worte bilden nur einen blassen Schatten der Wirklichkeit ab. Aber auf Eurem Schiff befindet sich noch wesentlich mehr Fleisch. Und somit ergeben sich noch wesentlich mehr ... Gelegenheiten zur Wiederholung."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Mundwinkel verziehen sich zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Worte bilden nur einen blassen Schatten der Wirklichkeit ab. Aber auf Eurem Schiff befindet sich noch wesentlich mehr Fleisch. Und somit ergeben sich noch wesentlich mehr ... Gelegenheiten zur Wiederholung."

languages.text: {n}Dudaklarının kenarları yukarı doğru kıvrılarak gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Kelimeler, hakikatin yalnızca solgun bir gölgesidir. Ancak geminde daha pek çok et var. Daha pek çok... Performansımızı tekrarlama fırsatı var."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of his lips quirk up into a smile.{/n} "Words are a pale shadow of the reality. But there is still plenty more meat on your ship. And plenty more... opportunities for a repeat performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dudaklarının kenarları yukarı doğru kıvrılarak gülümsemeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Kelimeler, hakikatin yalnızca solgun bir gölgesidir. Ancak geminde daha pek çok et var. Daha pek çok da... Performansımızı tekrarlama fırsatı var."
